name: RHEEM WRX05021 - 5 kW Electric Heat Kit
description:
RHEEM WRX05021 - 5 kW Electric Heat Kit

High-efficiency electric heat kit providing 5kW heating capacity with 17,060 BTU output for supplemental heating in heat pump systems. Designed for residential applications with single-stage operation and professional installation.

5kW Heating Capacity

Delivers 17,060 BTU of reliable supplemental heating for enhanced comfort during extreme weather conditions.

Single-Stage Operation

Reliable single-stage electric heating elements provide consistent and dependable supplemental heat when needed.

Professional Grade

Engineered for integration with Rheem heat pump systems and professional installation by certified technicians.

Efficient Design

Optimized electrical design with 24.4 amp draw for effective supplemental heating in residential applications.

The RHEEM WRX05021 provides reliable supplemental heating performance for heat pump systems during extreme weather conditions.
